sidebar.text: Every once in a while I get a chance to share my thoughts in front of larger groups. Here are some things I had to say...

content.title: Presentations
content.subtitle: I don't like presenting that much

elements.title: Warning: Product Managers and Data Scientists at Work
elements.description: Discusses how product managers and data scientists can work effectively with each other. While product managers are responsible for making sure that the team is building the right product, the data scientist, alongside other team contributors is responsible for building the product right!
elements.occasion: Data Scientist Onboarding at Capital One

elements.title: Tools to Manage Your Money (in the 21st Century)
elements.description: Over the past 5 years, there has been significant innovation in the financial technology space, especially in the consumer space. For people looking for new tools to help manage their money and make great financial decisions, this presentation highlights the new tools on the block.
elements.occasion: Milken Scholars Alumni of New York

elements.title: Looking Forward: Careers in Financial Services
elements.description: Financial innovation is driving phenomenal change, especially in the way work gets done. This presentation offers a (bleak) projection over the next 5 years about what careers will look like in the financial services sectors and discusses some of the drivers of change.
